meaningMnemonic: Your <kanji>blood</kanji> <kanji>fluid</kanji> <kanji>type</kanji> is your <vocabulary>blood type</vocabulary>. This is a very important thing to know in Japan for some reason.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji, at least the 血液 part. The 型 uses the kun'yomi reading, probably because it's an add-on word.
